descr.p: LazUtils is the Lazarus Utilities Package and contains non-visual routines, types, and classes needed by the LCL and other packages. Historically, some units originated from the LCL and the CodeTools used in the Lazarus IDE.
This unit contains code in the initialization section to register the lazutils package for use in the Lazarus IDE.
